author: stsp
msg: [Note from the future: Reverted in r37312]
We don't want to be editing files outside of a working copy.

author: hwright
msg: Properly order the sequence of destruction actions when unversioning
something in the working copy.  Close the working copy before blowing it away,
which should help some of the windows wc-ng test failures under-the-hood.
(svn_wc__adm_destory): Close the baton before destroying the administrative

author: lgo
msg: ra_serf: clean up GSSAPI objects after use.
(gss_api_get_credentials): release the two objects returned by
to cleanup the gssapi context when the serf session is cleared

author: lgo
msg: Use an installed GSSAPI library to get Kerberos authentication support in
(SVN_RA_SERF_LIB_GSSAPI): New macro that finds a gssapi installation.
* configure.ac: Call SVN_RA_SERF_LIB_GSSAPI and set the right defines to
* Makefile.in: Add in necessary values to let the build system know where
to find the gssapi include and lib files.
(gssapi): Add gssapi as a known lib, so that the build system will pull in
